document.full_text: a man convicted of murder in what he called an assisted suicide was sentenced on monday to 20 years to life in prison in the death of the new york motivational speaker who hired him.
document.title: hired killer in assisted suicide sentenced to prison
lines_and_colors: a man convicted of murder in what he called an assisted suicide was sentenced on monday to 20 years to life in prison in the death of the new york motivational speaker who hired him.
